847 if( has_trait( trait_HYPEROPIC ) && !worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
848 !has_effect( effect_contacts ) ) {
849 int main_rank_penalty = 0;
850 if( making.skill_used == skill_electronics ) {
851 main_rank_penalty = 2;
852 } else if( making.skill_used == skill_tailor ) {
853 main_rank_penalty = 1;
854 }
855 skill_dice -= main_rank_penalty * 4;
856 }
857
858 // It's tough to craft with paws. Fortunately it's just a matter of grip and fine-motor,
859 // not inability to see what you're doing
860 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
861 for( const std::pair<const skill_id, int> &skib : mut->craft_skill_bonus ) {
862 if( making.skill_used == skib.first ) {
863 skill_dice += skib.second;
864 }
865 }
866 }
867
868 // Sides on dice is 16 plus your current intelligence
869 ///\EFFECT_INT increases crafting success chance
870 const int skill_sides = 16 + int_cur;
871
872 int diff_dice;
873 if( secondary_difficulty > 0 ) {
874 diff_dice = making.difficulty * 3 + secondary_difficulty;
875 } else {
876 // Since skill level is * 4 also
877 diff_dice = making.difficulty * 4;
878 }
879
880 const int diff_sides = 24; // 16 + 8 (default intelligence)
881
882 const double skill_roll = dice( skill_dice, skill_sides );
883 const double diff_roll = dice( diff_dice, diff_sides );
884
885 if( diff_roll == 0 ) {
886 // Automatic success
887 return 2;
888 }
889
890 return skill_roll / diff_roll;
891}

Remove charges from a specific item (given by its item position).

Parameters
